definition: tassel/sth shaped like a tassel (e.g. a leaf etc)/ribbon
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
to volunteer for military service/to offer oneself for an assignment
Li Ying (1963-), Japanese-educated Chinese documentary film director

to die a hero/martyrdom in a good cause

sentences.english: Study in Chemical Ecology of Tritrophic Interactions Among Rice, Nilaparvata Lugens and Anagrus Nilaparvatae;

sentences.english: If the fire-alarm goes, staff should assemble outside building.
sentences.chinese: 火景警報響時全體人員纓到樓外集合。

sentences.english: These suggest that N. lugens infestation levels influence the host preference and performance of the parasitoid.
sentences.chinese: 說明褐飛蝨爲害程度能影響稻蝨纓小蜂的寄主適宜性。
